Adrian Perkins , 19 , of Pine Valley , California , died at King Hussein Hospital in Amman , Jordan , according to information released by the Fort Carson public affairs office .
Investigators are still trying to determine the details of the incident , but officials confirmed there were no Jordanians involved , the public affairs office said .

Perkins , who joined the Army in August 2012 , was assigned to 1 st Battalion , 67th Armor Regiment , 2nd Brigade Combat Team , 4th Infantry Division , at Fort Carson .
